page.title: 10Sports Facilities, Wombourne
page.content: In relation to its size Wombourne has many sporting facilities. Cricket is regularly played on the village green where there are also tennis courts and a bowling green. Across the High Street at the Conway Club you can play snooker and squash. At Ounsdale Sports Centre there is now a new swimming pool complex with sauna and weights room. The large sports hall there caters for many indoor sports. Just outside there are 6 tennis courts, a hockey pitch and 4 football pitches. Wombourne Cricket Club and Wombourne Hockey Club are both successful clubs. They have several teams and encourage young players to join and participate. Cyclists and joggers meet at weekends. As with other country areas many public houses have their own teams for darts, football and dominoes.
